categories: Category:Sith of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire
Category:Unidentified Sith of the One Sith

nodes.text: A member of Darth Krayt's One Sith, a Zabrak Sith was one of many led by Darth Nihl at the Massacre at Ossus in 130 ABY, purging the Ossus Jedi Praxeum and scattering the New Jedi Order. Before the end of the battle, the Zabrak Sith was killed by Kol Skywalker.
